snippet: Tyson Chandler was back in the lineup Sunday at Madison Square Garden, where the crowd went from sleepy to cranky as the afternoon wore on and a losing streak grew to five with a loss to the 76ers.
abstract: Philadelphia 76ers defeat New York Knicks, 106-94, as Knicks drop their fifth straight game in NBA action.
lead_paragraph: Tyson Chandler was back in the lineup Sunday at Madison Square Garden, where the crowd went from sleepy to cranky as the afternoon wore on and a losing streak grew to five with a loss to the 76ers.

headline.seo: Chandler Returns but Result Is Same for Struggling Knicks
headline.main: Chandler Returns, but With Stars Benched Late, Knicks Keep Losing
headline.print_headline: Chandler Returns, but With Stars Benched Late, Knicks Keep Losing
